name: RonJohn® Auto Strip
description: RonJohn® Auto Strip is a medium viscosity blend developed to safely remove automotive paints, powder coat, and adhesives. RonJohn® Auto Strip is specifically formulated for high effectiveness on difficult crossed linked automotive paint systems comprised of urethanes and epoxies. About the thickness of corn syrup, it is safe for use on metals, wood, fiberglass, concrete, and certain plastics like polyester, polyethylene, and nylon. It can soften or dissolve the toughest automotive coatings in a matter of a few hours.
